TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Describes a change in the scrolling state and contains the required arguments for a event.
Gets the updated height of the extent.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the updated extent height.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to get the value of the ExtentHeight property.
[!code-vb[scrollchangedeventargsLayout#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ScrollChangedEventArgs_layout/Window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-cs[scrollchangedeventargsLayout#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ScrollChangedEventArgs_layout/Window1.xaml.cs#3)]

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

Docs.param: The event handler to invoke, in this case the delegate.
The target upon which the `genericHandler` is invoked.
Docs.summary: Performs proper type casting before invoking the type-safe delegate

remarks.format: ## Remarks If you provide either the `genericHandler` or `genericTarget` as a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), exceptions are raised.
